questions.q: Which function is used to get the length of a string?
questions.explain: count() is used for lists, size() is used for arrays, and length() is the wrong function name.

questions.q: Which of the following is NOT a valid keyword?
questions.explain: class is used for creating objects, def is used to create functions, and global is used to make variables accessible everywhere in a program.

questions.q: Which method is used to add an item at the end of a list?
questions.explain: insert() adds at a specified position, add() is used in sets, and extend() is used for adding iterables together.
